Why You Should Stop Reading Hacker News/Why You Shouldn't Trust Everything On The Front Page/ Finding Advice In All The Wrong Places

Reading blogs, hackernews etc is not the way to learn the best information at least for business, because if it’s the best info, why would someone share it to the public for free reducing their own profit. Maybe this applies to other software info too?

Talk about reasons TO share it for free – build self brand name, build name for company, to get future jobs etc

To those who this is obvious, ignore the post, but after talking to some other students/friends in CS, it’s not obvious to everyone because they dont' know what to look out for when just starting – low signal to noise ratio of information
